Title: Blood Under the Bridge

Actors: Jamie Hector, Sarah Aldrich, John Ales, Justene Alpert
Plot: The secret effort to smear Bosch intensifies. Harry and his colleagues struggle to uncover who's trying to frame him. Irving closes a chapter in his personal life, but is ensnared in ...
